previews.name: switcheroo
previews.description:
**Note:** Enabling and disabling Pages in the Pages API is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2019-03-14-enabling-disabling-pages/) preview for more details. To access the new endpoints during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.17/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.switcheroo-preview+json

```
